definition: to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

pinyin: guan1 zhuang4 dong4 mai4 pang2 lu4 yi2 zhi2 shou3 shu4
containing_words.word: 冠状动脉旁路移植手术

sentences.english: The 67-year-old kidney transplant recipient has a weakened immune system.
sentences.chinese: 这位接受过肾脏移植手术的老人免疫系统非常弱。

sentences.english: She would have died without the transplant.
sentences.chinese: 如果不做心脏移植手术，她就会死去。

sentences.english: Gone would be transplant failures and the need for immune-suppressing drugs.
sentences.chinese: 移植手术失败和抗免疫反应药物将成为过去。

sentences.english: The KCGMH-LTP performed the first living donor liver transplant without transfusion of blood or blood products in the world.
sentences.chinese: 高雄长庚医院完成全球首例未输血活体肝脏移植手术。

sentences.english: Louis Washkansky lasted only 18 days with his new transplanted heart.
sentences.chinese: 第一位接受心脏移植手术的病人，只多活了18天。

sentences.english: Last year 3, 513 organ transplants were carried out in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 去年在英国进行了3513例移植手术。

sentences.english: The elongation patch was used in only 8 transplantations.
sentences.chinese: 仅在8例移植手术中使用了延长修补操作。

sentences.english: Suturing is the key to the success of corneal transplant surgery.
sentences.chinese: 角膜缝合操作是角膜移植手术成功的关键。

sentences.english: The first was performed in 1967 by Christiaan Barnard.
sentences.chinese: 1967年巴纳德首次进行人体心脏移植手术。

sentences.english: After that, heart-transplant as good as began.
sentences.chinese: 自那以后，心脏移植手术实际上就开始了。

sentences.english: He underwent a liver transplant in 2009 but returned to work.
sentences.chinese: 他于2009年接受肝脏移植手术后重返工作。

sentences.english: His life was saved by a last-minute heart transplant.
sentences.chinese: 他的生命的被最后一分钟心脏移植手术拯救。

definition: to check for compatibility (for an organ transplant)
blood generating stem cells (in bone marrow)

pinyin: xin1 zang4 da1 qiao2 shou3 shu4
